title: Online Instructional Design Course for Cultivating Scientific Literacy (Nature of Science, NOS)

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-Compatible LMS Environment with Socially Integrated Education Utilizing Biology Case Studies

learning_goals: Learners can explain the epistemic nature of science (theory-ladenness of observation, tentativeness of scientific knowledge, etc.) with 85% or higher accuracy
Learners can produce critical reflection reports incorporating NOS (Nature of Science) elements by analyzing real biological research cases
Learners can create a 5-minute video presentation applying NOS perspectives to science-related social issues encountered in daily life (climate change, vaccines, etc.)

resources: Biology Case-Based Nature of Science (NOS) Worksheet
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
